verbose_text: We performed DNA methylation profiling of human ALK+ (n = 5) and ALK- (n = 5) tumors and peripheral blood activated CD3 + T cells from healthy donors (n = 5) using the Illumina Infinium HumanMethylation450 BeadChip, which covers 482,421 CpG dinucleotides and 99% of RefSeq genes.
evidence: ALK+ (n = 5) and ALK- (n = 5) tumors and peripheral blood activated CD3
